sentences.en: At midnight, the German flag will be raised over the Reichstag.
sentences.cn: 半夜时，德国国旗将在德国国会大厦升起。

sentences.en: English, Dutch and German are cognate languages.
sentences.cn: 英语、荷兰语、德语是同语族的语言

sentences.en: Few officers thought that a German-Czech war could be localized.
sentences.cn: 没几个军官认为德捷之战可被控制为局部战争。

sentences.en: German cameras at knock-down prices flooded the British market.
sentences.cn: 德国产的廉价相机充斥着英国市场。

sentences.en: German history
sentences.cn: 德国历史

sentences.en: German law forbids the dumping of hazardous waste on German soil.
sentences.cn: 德国法律禁止在德国本土倾倒有害废料。

sentences.en: Half of the books are in German.
sentences.cn: 这些书有一半是德语的。

sentences.en: He is German
sentences.cn: 他是德国人。

sentences.en: Horst, a German from Hamburg, was a true original.
sentences.cn: 来自德国汉堡的霍斯特是个名副其实的怪人。

sentences.en: I heard a very angry man talking in German.
sentences.cn: 我听到一个怒不可遏的人说着德语。

sentences.en: Immediately to our right the old German summer resort was awakening.
sentences.cn: 紧靠我们右面，古老的德国避暑胜地正在苏醒。

sentences.en: On the aeroplane I was befriended by a delightful German woman.
sentences.cn: 在飞机上，一位讨人喜欢的德国女士对我就像朋友一样。

sentences.en: Spaniards are worried about German investors deserting Spain for Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 西班牙人担心德国投资者放弃西班牙而转向东欧。

sentences.en: Susan and the girl were still nattering away in German.
sentences.cn: 苏姗和那个女孩还在用德语聊个没完。

sentences.en: The average German will enjoy 40 days' paid holiday this year.
sentences.cn: 今年，德国人将平均享受40天的带薪假期。

sentences.en: The German authorities are considering an airlift if the situation becomes critical.
sentences.cn: 如果局势变得危急，德国当局将考虑实施空运。

sentences.en: Their German peers had a more developed sense of citizenship.
sentences.cn: 和他们同龄的德国人有着更强烈的公民归属感。

sentences.en: Their unit was shelling the German lines only seven miles away.
sentences.cn: 他们的部队在炮轰仅有7英里之遥的德军防线。

sentences.en: They were conversing in German, their only common language.
sentences.cn: 他们正用德语交谈，这是他们唯一的共同语言。

sentences.en: Tony Woodcock has joined German amateur team SC Brueck as coach.
sentences.cn: 托尼·伍德科克加盟德国业余队SC布吕克队担任教练。

phrases.tran_cn: 德国牧羊犬；阿尔萨斯狼犬；德国警犬（等于German police dog）
n. 德国牧羊犬；阿尔萨斯狼犬

trans.tran_en: relating to Germany, its people, or its language
